message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $60. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $82.50?
I'm getting close to the price I'm willing to pay. How about we meet at $78?
